page.title: 19EVENTS
page.content: Each year the school holds the following events in the village .The fete and the children's sports afternoon and concerts etc.The church holds a fete at the castle each year. Last year Honda launched an event to demonstrate their new four wheeled motor bike.Unfortunately during the display, a helicopter doing a stunt with the motor bikes, crashed and the pilot was killed.The Slade pop group made a video at Eastnor castle and included a pipe band in their display. Every year there is a land-rover rally at Eastnor park.They come from all over the country, sometimes there are even land-rovers from other countries. There are many caravan rallies held in the deer park each year.
